snippet: At the Belmont Stakes on Saturday, California Chrome could become the first Triple Crown winner in 36 years. Fans are preparing by buying unusual amounts of betting tickets, some for potential profit but mostly for souvenirs.
abstract: California Chrome could become the first Triple Crown winner in 36 years at the Belmont Stakes; fans are preparing by buying unusual amounts of betting tickets, some for potential profit but mostly for souvenirs.
lead_paragraph: At the Belmont Stakes on Saturday, California Chrome could become the first Triple Crown winner in 36 years. Fans are preparing by buying unusual amounts of betting tickets, some for potential profit but mostly for souvenirs.

headline.main: Favorite for Triple Crown Inspires a Run on Betting Tickets
headline.print_headline: Favorite for Triple Crown Inspires a Run on Betting Tickets
